system.description:
A fabulous jewelled necklace which is cursed to strangle anyone who wears it.

  • Wearing: The necklace constricts around the characterâ€™s neck, inflicting 6 points of damage per round.

  • Removing: The necklace can only be removed by magic (e.g. @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.LvD3XbuvgBpJ5eEL]{remove curse}).

  • If the character dies: The necklace remains constricted in place until the corpse has rotted away (about 1 month). It then loosens, ready for another victim.
